title: Announcing the Estuary Host Support Network
description:
There has been a fair amount of interest in starting estuary groups. Job and Mattias and Dave talked about this in a recent Randos convo. https://youtu.be/sZzyu66_HNs

Groups like this don't just happen. They have to be grown. Even if they are growing people need support. John Van Donk wants to help leaders and potential leaders work through these things together. 

If you're interested in being in this group here is the link to the application. https://forms.gle/9jB7keViHdB2L4er8

This conversation is not about teaching people what estuary is, and how to do it.. 
That is a much more nebulous process, which is caught not taught…
Different instantiations are now happening online, such as the comment section of Paul’s YouTube channel, or the Bridges of Meaning section of the Discord.
But it appears that at least some people feel a need to have conversations in the flesh, belly to belly, face to face, or as Job calls it, off-line.
There already are Meetup groups, for example, our own in Sacramento, and in Chino, and elsewhere. Sometimes we talk about ideas, at other times we talk about real life, about the challenges of making your bed, cleaning your room, taking responsibility, and how to navigate the suffering we encounter.
This conversation is not about creating some magic formula to make people do things they don't want to do.
Rather, for those people for whom YouTube or the Discord are no longer sufficient, we are trying to imagine ways to create spaces where they can go.
And those places will not come into existence without leaders.
So, this is about finding, and mobilizing, leaders...

Here's a document with a longer description. https://docs.google.com/document/d/1boPBz23J3NXnDjCFSs4M0o3AkwV6sTpXXdMFXc_ym0s/edit?usp=sharing

Click here to meetup with other channel viewers for conversation https://discord.gg/jdVk8XU 

Vanderklips channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCX0jIcadtoxELSwehCh5QTg

If you want to schedule a one-on-one conversation check here. https://paulvanderklay.me/2019/08/06/converzations-with-pvk/

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/ 

All Amazon links here are part of the Amazon Affiliate Program. Amazon pays a small commission at no additional cost to you if you buy through one of the product links here. 

To support this channel/podcast on Paypal: https://paypal.me/paulvanderklay

To support this channel/podcast with Bitcoin (BTC): 37TSN79RXewX8Js7CDMDRzvgMrFftutbPo 
To support this channel/podcast with Bitcoin Cash (BCH) qr3amdmj3n2u83eqefsdft9vatnj9na0dqlzhnx80h 
To support this channel/podcast with Ethereum (ETH): 0xd3F649C3403a4789466c246F32430036DADf6c62

https://www.patreon.com/paulvanderklay

Also on Lbry: https://lbry.tv/@paulvanderklay

Paul's Church Content at Living Stones Channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCh7bdktIALZ9Nq41oVCvW-A

To support Paul's work by supporting his church give here. https://tithe.ly/give?c=2160640
